HTML5 - Forms - New Features

HTML5 comes with new form features, such as

  • datalist: specifies a list of pre-defined options for a input element which is used with auto completion
  • output: Used to display/submit a value which is obtained by calculation
    • form: the form id, if the output is not in the form
    • for: ids on input concerned for the calculation
<input list="htmlTags"> <datalist id="htmlTags"> <option value="aside"> <option value="footer"> <option value="header"> </datalist> <form oninput="x.value=parseInt(a.value)+parseInt(b.value)">0 <input type="range" id="a" value="50">+ <input type="number" id="b" value="50">= <output name="x" for="a b"></output> </form>
